BRSW.Show_card_damage: Show card and roll trait and damage
BRSW.Single_click_hint: Select what happens when you single click a name
BRSW.Shit_click_hint: Select what happens when you click a name while pressing SHIFT
BRWS.Control_click_hint: Select what happens when you click a name while pressing Control
BRSW.Alt_click_hint: Select what happens when you click a name while pressing Alt
BRSW.See_result_hint: Select who if anyone can see the result card
BRSW.Master_only_result_card: Only the master can see the card
BRSW.BenniFrontHint: Path to the image to be shown on the Benny front
BRSW.BackBennieHint: Path to the image to be shown on the Benny back (blank uses the same as front)
BRSW.ExpendPPText: {name} spends {number} Power Point(s) and has {newPP} left.
BRSW.RechargePPText: {name} recharges {number} Power Point(s) and now has {newPP}.
BRSW.RechargePPTextHitMax: {name} recharges {rechargedPP} and now is at the maximum of ppm.
BRSW.RechargePPBennyText: {name} recharges 5 Power Point(s) using a Benny and now has {newPP}.
BRSW.RechargePPBennyTextHitMax: {name} recharges 5 Power Point(s) using a Benny and is now at the maximum of {ppm}.
BRSW.collapse-chat-window: Collapse by default the modifier window
BRSW.collapse-chat-window_hint: Start with the window above the chat collapsed
BRSW.AmmunitionStatus: {actor_name} fires {number} round(s) from a {weapon_name} and has {newCharges} left
BRSW.TGTargetSelected: Get tougness from target or selected token
BRSW.AmmoManagementHint: When marked Subtract ammo will be selected by default
BRSW.PPManagementHint: When checked Subtract pp will be selected by default
